about_the_game:
The Realm of Ink Wash Painting, the Way of Sparring

This game is a CCG (Collectible Card Game) themed on oriental mythological immortal cultivation, developed by Hetu Studio under Guigu Technology and based on the IP of "Tale of Immortal". It presents the concept inherited from Guigu: face difficulties head-on, stay true to your original intention; make careful choices and, more importantly, seize the fleeting opportunities to change your fate against the will of heaven.

Hone your mental state and skills in "Ancient Star Chart", outwit your opponents with careful planning, and ascend to the supreme realm.

(The game is still under development, and the following in-game footage does not represent the final product.)

You will play as a hero from one of the three races, namely humans, gods, and demons, grasping powerful supernatural abilities and building your card deck to start battles with other fellow cultivators.

The combat style of auto-chess is integrated into the game. In each round, you use the drawn cards to deploy your troops. Some cards take effect instantly, while others will work at the appropriate time. The direct confrontation among cards takes place at the end of the round, and every stage of the game will put your strategies to the test. Moreover, various concepts derived from the immortal cultivation setting, such as magic treasures, combat moves, and transcending tribulations, make the game even more unpredictable and interesting.

Who will eventually break the shackles of reincarnation and step into the supreme realm?

  • Humans: Achieve breakthroughs during the game and vigorously display the methods of mortals. Combat moves, elixirs, armors, and magic arrays can all lead to victory.

  • Gods: Heavenly phenomena appear, and they can control the power of nature. The four elements are at their disposal.

  • Demons: They can transform their forms and release wild demon spells. Breaking free from restraints, they can dominate the whole battlefield.

  • With a unique magic treasure mechanism, the situation of the battle can be reversed in an instant.


We are waiting for all fellow cultivators to come and discuss the Dao.

The game features a large number of cards ranging from common mortal items to supreme immortal ones. Collect them and build powerful card decks. Each card deck will bring a brand-new experience to the battles. Some of them even possess an unparalleled visual impact. Make good use of them to turn the situation around.

Besides staying away from the sharp edges of other fellow cultivators for the moment, you will also encounter the obstruction of all kinds of immortals, demons and strange creatures in the world of "Ancient Star Chart". In the carefully designed PVE levels, you should resolve the threats from various enemies and look for ways to defeat them.
